name: Whoopy Boopy
description:
Hello, and welcome!

Whoopy Boopy is a puzzle platformer game.

There are 12 levels, each introducing a new mechanic or providing a fun challenge!

Controls

Use your mouse to place Instructions for the bot.
boop boopy boop

Credits

Everything was made by Alonzu, EXCEPT:

Music: 8 Bit Surf by David Renda. Link: https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/downloads-c/8-bit-music/6

Made for Wowie Game Jam 4.0.
